name: UNSTABLE DREAMS
description:
DESCRIPTION

The game was created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 49.
This is an rythm/action game mixing 2D and 3D graphics.
You play a girl, who has in trouble, and dream about a strange way to liberate her spirit.
Ludum Dare link here.

FEATURES
  • Linear action game.
  • Unique graphics with beautifull shadeless environnement.
  • 3D models for background and pixel art (sprite) for monster and character.
CONTROLS
  • WASD or ARROW to move.
  • Enter to valid and shoot.
  • F to switch in fullscreen mode (windows).
  • R to restart the game.
  • Escape to pause the game.
